recipes.label: The Key to My Heart
recipes.startdescription: I can use this rite to give an Hour entry to my body? Power comes with them like a scent. Of course... I don't know which Hour might come.
recipes.description: The ritual is complete. The door is opening.

recipes.label: The Key to My Heart?
recipes.startdescription: Can I use this rite to give an Hour entry to my body? Power comes with them like a scent.
recipes.description: It didn't work. I need another invocation too - something to open the way. And I require a willing sacrifice.

recipes.label: The Door in my Dreams
recipes.startdescription: I can use this rite to follow in the Watchman's footsteps, and learn of the house without walls.
recipes.description: The ritual is complete. The door is opening.

recipes.label: The Door in my Dreams?
recipes.startdescription: Can I use this rite to follow in the Watchman's footsteps, and learn of the house without walls?
recipes.description: It didn't work. I need to call upon another power, too - a power of opening. And I'll need funds, to purchase the rare-wax candles that will light the Watchman's path.

recipes.label: THE RED GRAIL COMES
recipes.startdescription: My heart swells; my blood burns. I am very close. I must devote myself more fervently.
recipes.description: The rite failed! I was close - as close as the flame to a candle, as the blood to a heart. I must try again.

recipes.label: I HEAR THE WATCHMAN'S FOOTSTEPS
recipes.startdescription: The walls of the world tremble like silk. I am very close. All my thoughts must converge.
recipes.description: I touched it with my fingertips, the understanding I seek. So close. I must try again.
